map_table_tmb.title: Hike as much or as little as you want !

rsvp.title: Interested?

wedding_radio_button.title: Wedding
wedding_radio_button.maybe: Sounds fun but I'll need to wait and see.
wedding_radio_button.no: The Alps are really far away... probably not :'-(

tmb_radio_button.title: Hiking
tmb_radio_button.yes: I want to hike the full TMB! Release the beast!
tmb_radio_button.maybe: There's buses between the various points...right? (Yes.)
tmb_radio_button.no: I'll wave at you from the gondola.

rsvp.infos: The official invite with further information will come in Spring 2022, but we want to get a head start on planning.

tmb-page.title: What gear should you bring ?
tmb-page.tent: Tent (to discuss to minimize the number of tents)
tmb-page.sleeping-bag: Sleeping bag (ideally confort temp 0deg Celsius, or below)
tmb-page.trash-bag: Trash bags (to put your stuff if it rains)
tmb-page.stove: Stove & Gas (to discuss, we should be able to share)
